summary: Comprehensive testing of House of Neelam e-commerce app completed. Backend 100% functional (15/15 tests passed). Frontend fully functional with Razorpay integration working correctly. All major features tested: Homepage, Products with filters, Search, Admin login/dashboard/categories, Cart, and Checkout with Razorpay payment modal.

design_issues.issue: Broken image for 'Green Peral Necklace' product - shows 'https://www.google.com/abc.png' which is not a valid image URL
design_issues.recommendation: Update the product image URL to a valid image

passed_tests: ✅ Homepage renders with navigation, search bar, and hero section
✅ Products page loads with filters sidebar (category, price, sort)
✅ Product search functionality works - dropdown shows matching products
✅ Admin login works at /admin/login with admin@houseofneelam.com / admin123
✅ Admin dashboard shows stats after login (Total Revenue, Orders, Pending, Low Stock)
✅ Admin categories management - view 4 categories with subcategories
✅ Cart functionality - add to cart, view cart drawer with items
✅ Checkout page shows order summary and guest form
✅ Razorpay checkout flow - creates order and opens Razorpay payment modal
✅ Mobile responsive design working correctly
Backend: GET /api/products - Returns product list
Backend: GET /api/products/enhanced - Returns products with filters
Backend: GET /api/products/search - Search functionality working
Backend: GET /api/categories - Returns categories list
Backend: POST /api/admin/login - Admin authentication working
Backend: GET /api/admin/dashboard/stats - Dashboard stats endpoint
Backend: GET /api/admin/categories - Admin categories list
Backend: GET /api/admin/orders - Admin orders list
Backend: POST /api/orders - Order creation working
Backend: POST /api/razorpay/create-order - Razorpay order creation working
Backend: POST /api/auth/guest - Guest authentication working
action_items: LOW PRIORITY: Update 'Green Peral Necklace' product image URL (currently https://www.google.com/abc.png is broken)
critical_code_review_comments: Razorpay integration is properly implemented with order creation and payment modal
Cart state persistence is working correctly across page navigations
Admin authentication flow redirects correctly to dashboard
All data-testid attributes are in place for testing
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing seeded products and categories
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested and working. Razorpay integration verified - payment modal opens correctly in test mode. One minor issue: Green Peral Necklace has a broken image URL. Cart persistence, admin login redirect, and checkout flows all working correctly as fixed in previous iterations.

razorpay_integration_notes.flow_verified: Order creation → Razorpay order creation → Payment modal opens
api_endpoints_tested: POST /api/razorpay/create-order - Creates Razorpay order with amount in paise
